item.title: Python Solver
item.description: What is it? This python script, which most likely has quite a few bugs can tell you information about a quadratic function that is in standard form! It’s able to tell you the axis of symmetry, range, y-intercept, x-intercept(s), and more. Why? I’m lasy and wanted something that could do my homework for me. Hopefully by putting this out there you might be able to learn from it, and cheat with it i do not condone cheating.
